channel.title: One Stop Pinball Shop
channel.description: Recent content on One Stop Pinball Shop

item.title: Banana
item.description: Add a fun banana to your King Kong pinball machine! Available in two variants: classic Yellow or Luminous glow-in-the-dark that adds extra visual appeal during gameplay.

item.title: Barrel with Banana
item.description: This unique, handpainted barrel features a vibrant banana on top, designed specifically for the King Kong pinball table. Crafted with attention to detail, it adds a playful and thematic touch to your game.

item.title: Set of palm trees
item.description: Give your pinball some palm trees to add realism and a nice touch. This set includes five palm trees with versatile mounting options, allowing you to create your own custom tropical arrangement. Have a look at the playfield video for some excellent placement ideas.

item.title: King Kong Gong Replacement (Pro Model)
item.description: ðŸ¦ 3D Printed King Kong Pro Gong Replacement Elevate the look of your King Kong Pro Pinball Machine with this precision-engineered, 3D-printed gong replacement. Designed for a perfect fit and crafted from high-quality, durable materials, this custom gong is the ideal upgrade for enthusiasts seeking optimal performance and aesthetics.

item.title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Handmade Wood Edition
item.description: Handcrafted wooden edition - A unique 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) that combines artisanal craftsmanship with cutting-edge display technology. Each unit features a custom-built wooden housing, carefully handmade to bring warmth and character to your arcade or pinball setup.

item.title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Industrial CNC Edition
item.description: Industrial CNC-machined edition - The ultimate 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) featuring a precision-manufactured housing created with advanced CNC machining technology. Every unit delivers uncompromising quality with perfectly machined tolerances and a professional finish.

item.title: Pulp Fiction Topper - Jack Rabbit Slim's Dance
item.description: Bring the iconic Jack Rabbit Slim’s dance contest scene to life on your pinball machine! This Pulp Fiction topper features Vincent Vega and Mia Wallace on the backside of the glass, creating a stunning stereoscopic depth effect. The sound-reactive LED strip pulses to the music and game sounds, illuminating the artwork with dynamic lighting.

item.title: Red black free text
item.description: Personalized flipper keychain with your very own text. Specify up to 10 characters for your very own personalized keychain. Use it for the key on your coin door or as a functional key for daily use.
